verses.verse: You shall not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or a <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> in which is a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> or anything <S%H7451>evil;<s%> for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

If there is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H259>you,<s%> within any of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H376>you,<s%> man or <S%H802>woman,<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

and has <S%H3212>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H8121>them,<s%> or the sun, or the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> or any of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> which I have not <S%H6680>commanded;<s%>

and it be <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8085>you,<s%> and you have heard of <S%H1875>it,<s%> then you shall inquire <S%H3190>diligently;<s%> and <S%H571>behold,<s%> if it be true, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain,<s%> that such <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

then you shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> or that <S%H802>woman,<s%> who has <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> even the <S%H376>man<s%> or the <S%H802>woman;<s%> and you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H5619>stones.<s%>

At the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> shall he who is to <S%H4191>die<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> he shall not be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> on him to put him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterward<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

If there arises a <S%H1697>matter<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for you in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood,<s%> between <S%H1779>plea<s%> and <S%H1779>plea,<s%> and between <S%H5061>stroke<s%> and <S%H5061>stroke,<s%> being <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H7379>controversy<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> then you shall <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%>

and you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and to the <S%H8199>judge<s%> who shall be in those <S%H3117>days:<s%> and you shall <S%H1875>inquire;<s%> and they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the tenor of the <S%H6310>sentence<s%> which they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you from that <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%> and you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that they shall teach <S%H3384>you:<s%>

according to the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H4941>you,<s%> and according to the judgment which they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> you shall do; you shall not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> which they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H3225>you,<s%> to the right hand, nor to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2087>presumptuously,<s%> in not <S%H8085>listening<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> there before <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> or to the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> even that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> and you shall put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and do no more <S%H2102>presumptuously.<s%>

When you have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3423>you,<s%> and shall possess <S%H3427>it,<s%> and shall dwell <S%H559>therein,<s%> and shall say, "I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H1471>me,<s%> like all the nations that are around <S%H5439>me;<s%>"

you shall <S%H7760>surely<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3068>yourselves,<s%> whom Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> one from <S%H7130>among<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3201>you;<s%> you may not <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> over <S%H251>you,<s%> who is not your brother.

Only he shall not <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> to <S%H5971>himself,<s%> nor cause the people to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to the end that he may <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3254>you,<s%> "You shall not go <S%H7725>back<s%> that way <S%H1870>again.<s%>"

Neither shall he <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> to <S%H3824>himself,<s%> that his heart not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H3966>away:<s%> neither shall he greatly <S%H7235>multiply<s%> to himself <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

It shall <S%H3427>be,<s%> when he sits on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> that he shall <S%H3789>write<s%> him a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> out of that which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%>

and it shall be with <S%H7121>him,<s%> and he shall read therein all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life;<s%> that he may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> and these <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to do <S%H6213>them;<s%>

that his <S%H3824>heart<s%> not be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and that he not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left:<s%> to the end that he may <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> in his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> he and his <S%H1121>children,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
